name: hooks
description: Three projects are included - k8s: a kubernetes hook implementation that spins up pods dynamically to run a job - docker: A hook implementation of the runner's docker implementation  - A hook lib, which contains shared typescript definitions and utilities that the other packages consume

scripts.test: npm run test --prefix packages/docker && npm run test --prefix packages/k8s
scripts.bootstrap: npm install --prefix packages/hooklib && npm install --prefix packages/k8s && npm install --prefix packages/docker
scripts.build-all: npm run build --prefix packages/hooklib && npm run build --prefix packages/k8s && npm run build --prefix packages/docker
